text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Purusanni dusarya purusanci thatta udavu naye, sambhavatah te yancyahuna adhika cangale asaveta ani na striyanni (itara) striyanci thatta karavi. Sambhavatah tya, tyancyahuna adhika cangalya asavyata, ani apasata ekamekanvara dosaropa thevu naka ani na ekhadyala va'ita topana nava dya. Imananantara phiska (va'ita sabda) va'ita nava ahe. Ani je ksama-yacana na karatila, tara teca atyacari loka aheta
